Setup.description:
The game begins in the Setup Phase. Players join the game and select their specializations.

During this phase, the foundation for the lunar colony is established.
Setup.action:
Add players to the game by selecting their names and specializations.

Once all players have joined, advance to the Governance Phase.
Setup.strategies:
Choose specializations that complement each other for a balanced team.

Consider the roles: Engineer for infrastructure, Scientist for research, Politician for governance.

Governance.description:
In the Governance Phase, players make decisions about colony policies and resource allocation.

This phase focuses on strategic planning and voting on key initiatives.
Governance.action:
Discuss and vote on contracts and infrastructure projects.

Allocate resources based on colony priorities.
Governance.strategies:
Build alliances with other players to pass favorable policies.

Focus on long-term colony sustainability over short-term gains.

Operations.description:
The Operations Phase is where players execute their plans and manage daily colony activities.

Infrastructure is built, resources are harvested, and progress is made.
Operations.action:
Build and activate infrastructure.

Manage contracts and monitor colony metrics.
Operations.strategies:
Prioritize high-yield infrastructure for resource generation.

Balance power and crew capacity to maximize efficiency.
